{{html:
<form class="form-horizontal">
  <fieldset>

    <div id="legend" class="">
      <legend class="">Users e-mail addresses</legend>
    </div>

    <div class="control-group">
      <label class="control-label" for="input01">Owners</label>
        <div class="controls">
          <input type="text" placeholder="youremail@company.com" class="input-xlarge" value="$$owneremails">
          <p class="help-block">Seperate e-mail addresses with a comma</p>
        </div>
    </div>
  
    <div class="control-group">
      <label class="control-label" for="input01">Users</label>
      <div class="controls">
        <input type="text" placeholder="useremails@company.com" class="input-xlarge" value="$$useremails">
        <p class="help-block">Seperate e-mail addresses with a comma</p>
      </div>
    </div>

    <div class="controls">
      <button class="btn btn-success">Update</button>
    </div>
  </fieldset>
</form>
}}
